name: Galaxy Horde
description:
Offer your hearts to face the great evil galaxy horde!

We recommend playing via download for a better performance

Controls:

  1. Mouse left or space: shoot
  2. mouse right or x: shield
  3. mouse move: aim
  4. wasd/arrows: move ship
  5. P/Esc: Pause/unpause the game

Atribuitions:
